predicate.note: Frames file for 'surface' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'appear'.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Great Northern surged 20 1/8 to 62 7/8, well above Georgia-Pacific's offering price of $58 a share, amid speculation that other suitors for the company would surface or that the bid would be raised.
